channel.title: Need french help
channel.description:
This is a group project. It's me and one other person. One person has to ask questions and another person needs to answer them. In total we need 300 questions and 300 answers like, general shit, "how are you doing" "how many kids do you have" we've got quite a bit now. This isn't a written assignment, its a video.
If you could list 10 questions and 10 answers (and the translation if you have the time) it would help us out a lot. I'm a drunk Russian, and the person asking question is never asked any questions (so it doesn't matter). It can have some humor, or even a little cruelty but not too much. For example "do you have a daughter" "yes and she won't stop crying, so i hit her" I don't imagine we can have too much of that. Plz help!!!

item.title: Need french help
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

school is over… but thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Need french help
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

quelle est votre mère? - how is your mother?
elle est une putain sale - she is fine thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Need french help
item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:
@Bmaw wrote:

Devez-vous aller à la salle de bains ? - Do you have to go to the bathroom?

seulement mardi - Only on Tuesday’s

Read full topic

  • Votre maman

item.title: Need french help
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

This is a group project. It’s me and one other person. One person has to ask questions and another person needs to answer them. In total we need 300 questions and 300 answers like, general shit, “how are you doing” “how many kids do you have” we’ve got quite a bit now. This isn’t a written assignment, its a video.

If you could list 10 questions and 10 answers (and the translation if you have the time) it would help us out a lot. I’m a drunk Russian, and the person asking question is never asked any questions (so it doesn’t matter). It can have some humor, or even a little cruelty but not too much.
For example “do you have a daughter”
“yes and she won’t stop crying, so i hit her”
I don’t imagine we can have too much of that. Plz help!!!
